forum.name: updates
forum.description: find out what's new with anylad. feature announcements and bug fix info. thanks all!
forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

comments.text: Hi all! Here's what's new in v134.1 (your version: [version]):
You can now add quests in the new, default Quests board! The syntax is explained in its sticky. [board: quests]
There's now a highlight when context-lasering a thing!
You can now for testing see the guidance labels newcomers by clicking Me -> ... -> More -> Reset Guidance. (It lasts until you restart.)
We fixed an issue with a Rift guidance label still referring to the old controller setup!
We fixed an issue with the default forums not being found in forum searches!
